front.title: The IPv6 Hop-by-Hop Option for Geographical Unicast

abstract.t: For IPv6-based ITS applications, ITS data packets are required to be delivered to a specific destination ITS node. In this draft, a new IPv6 Hop-by-Hop option, the IPv6 Geo-unicast Hop-by-Hop option, with the geographical information of the destination ITS node and the forwarding mechanism information is defined.
